smbm.title: SM Town (QR Scanning / Fandom Platform)
smbm.des: A digital passport and K-POP membership service. Users collect stamps via QR code and GPS. Responsible for UI implementation from Figma, Google API integration, and dashboard development.

onepick.title: OnePick (Global Audition Platform)
onepick.des: A global audition and media platform with chat and rating features. In charge of building the UI, implementing APIs, and integrating with EformSign.

iposture.title: iPosture (Posture Analysis & Health)
iposture.des: A healthcare system that analyzes posture using MLKit and recommends exercises or centers. Worked on the web dashboard and replaced unsupported MG Kit features with custom solutions.

scb.title: CRM & Loan Systems
scb.des: Worked on two internal web applications: CRM and Loan management system. Handled UI implementation, business logic, testing, and maintenance. Built with React and TypeScript. Involved in security improvements and documentation.

joblist.title: List Company Applied
joblist.des: A full-stack web app to track job applications and interviews. Built with React, MongoDB, Express, MUI, and JWT authentication.

ecommerce.title: Simple Cart E-commerce
ecommerce.des: A simple e-commerce site built with the MERN stack (React, Express, MySQL). Deployed on Vercel.

Infomation.title: A Little Bit About Me
Infomation.summary: I’m a frontend developer with 4 years of experience working with React and UI/UX design. Through different projects, I’ve gained strong skills in web development, teamwork, and problem-solving. I’m now expanding my knowledge in backend to become a full-stack engineer.

1.title: University
1.desc: Studied Information Technology. Learned basic programming, web development, and software engineering.

2.title: Tokyo Sakura Japanese Language School
2.desc: Studied Japanese language and culture in Tokyo. Gained communication skills and deepened understanding of Japanese society.

3.title: SCB Bank
3.desc: Worked as a Frontend Developer on CRM and Loan management systems. Used React and TypeScript for UI development, testing, and maintenance.

4.title: Brickmate Group
4.desc: Worked with Japanese and Korean clients on projects like SM Town (fandom), iPosture (posture analysis), and OnePick (audition platform). Built responsive dashboards with Next.js and TypeScript.

5.title: Learning Backend
5.desc: Currently learning NestJS and Golang to become a full-stack developer.
